name: Amazon SNS (Simple Notification Service) HTTP Notification
short: A messaging service provided by AWS for sending notifications from the cloud to subscribers or other applications.
description: Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) is a fully-managed, pub/sub messaging service from AWS. It provides high-throughput, push-based, many-to-many messaging. It facilitates the communication between distributed systems, microservices, and serverless applications by sending individual messages to multiple subscribers. SNS supports various subscriber types like HTTP/S, email, mobile push, Lambda, SQS, etc. With the ability to fan-out messages to large numbers of recipients, SNS boosts the dynamism and responsiveness of cloud applications.
